Row.Text: The Mi-8 is a deadly air unit that in most respects acts like any ground unit, except that it cannot capture cities. Its movement of 6 makes it extremely quick, and it can move over all terrain types including mountains as if they were clear, but it must embark to cross water. Gunships receive a hefty combat bonus when fighting tanks.
Unit specialized in fighting Modern Armor and Tanks. It is capable of hovering over mountains.

The Mil Mi-8 (NATO reporting name: Hip) is a Soviet-designed medium twin-turbine transport helicopter. There are also armed gunship versions. The Mi-8 is among the world's most-produced helicopters,[1] used by over 50 countries. Russia is the main producer and the largest operator of the Mi-8/Mi-17 helicopter.
